fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtubep.description: View and manage your assets and associated content on YouTube

Activity.description: An activity resource contains information about an action that a channel has taken on YouTube.

contentDetails.description: Type specific information about the activity.

id.description: The unique ID of the activity.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

snippet.description: Basic details about the activity: title, description, thumbnails.

ActivityContentDetails.description: Details about the content of an activity: the video that was shared, the channel that was subscribed to, etc.

bulletin.description: Only present if the type is "bulletin".

resourceId.description: ID of the resource this bulletin is about.

comment.description: Only present if the type is "comment".

favorite.description: Only present if the type is "favorite".

like.description: Only present if the type is "like".

playlistItem.description: Only present if the type is "playlistItem".

playlistId.description: ID of the playlist the resource was added to.

resourceId.description: ID of the resource added to the playlist.

recommendation.description: Only set if the type is "recommendation".

reason.description: Reason for which the video was recommended.

seedResourceId.description: ID of the video that caused this recommendation.

social.description: Only present if the type is "social".

resourceId.description: ID of the resource this social activity is about.

subscription.description: Only present if the type is "subscription".

resourceId.description: ID of the resource subscribed to.

upload.description: Only present if the type is "upload".

ActivityListResponse.description: A paginated list of activities returned as a response to youtube.activities.list calls.

items.description: List of activities matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

pageInfo.description: Paging information for the list result.

ActivitySnippet.description: Basic details about an activity, including title, description, thumbnails, activity type and group.

groupId.description: Id of the group that this activity is part of.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the activity was published at.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

Channel.description: A channel resource contains information about a single YouTube channel.

contentDetails.description: Information about the channel content: upload playlist id, privacy status.

id.description: The unique ID of the channel.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

snippet.description: Basic details about the channel: title, description, and thumbnails.

statistics.description: Statistics about the channel: number of subscribers, views, and comments.

ChannelContentDetails.description: Details about the content of a channel.

uploads.description: The ID of the playlist containing the uploads of this channel.

ChannelListResponse.description: A paginated list of channels returned as the response to a youtube.channels.list call.

items.description: List of channels matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

pageInfo.description: Paging information for the list result.

ChannelSnippet.description: Basic details about a channel, including title, description and thumbnails.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the channel was published at.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

ChannelStatistics.description: Statistics about a channel: number of subscribers, number of videos in the channel, etc.

commentCount.description: Number of comments for this channel.

subscriberCount.description: Number of subscribers to this channel.

videoCount.description: Number of videos in the channel.

viewCount.description: Number of times the channel has been viewed.

ChannelTopicDetails.description: Freebase topic information related to the channel.

topicIds.description: List of topic ids for this channel *

GuideCategory.description: A guideCategory resource identifies a category that YouTube assigns based on a channel's content or other indicators, such as the channel's popularity.

etag.description: The eTag of the guide category.

id.description: The unique ID of the guide category.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

GuideCategoryListResponse.description: A paginated list of guide categories returned as the response to a youtube.guideCategories.list call.

items.description: List of categories matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

GuideCategorySnippet.description: Basic details about a guide category.

PageInfo.description: Paging details for lists of resources, including total number of items available and number of resources returned in a single page.

resultsPerPage.description: The number of results to display for each page.

Playlist.description: A playlist resource represents a single YouTube playlist.

id.description: The unique id of the playlist.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

snippet.description: Basic details about the playlist: title, description, thumbnails.

status.description: Status of the playlist: only privacy_status for now.

PlaylistItem.description: A playlistItem resource refers to another resource, such as a video, that is included in a playlist.

contentDetails.description: Content details about the playlist item: start and end clipping time.

etag.description: The eTag of the playlist item.

id.description: The unique id of the playlist item.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

snippet.description: Basic details about the playlist item: title, description, thumbnails.

PlaylistItemContentDetails.description: Details about the content of a playlist item, such as the video or the video fragment start and end time included in the playlist.

note.description: The user-generated note for this item.

PlaylistItemListResponse.description: A paginated list of playlist items returned as the response to a youtube.playlistItems.list call.

items.description: List of playlist items matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

pageInfo.description: Paging information for the list result.

PlaylistItemSnippet.description: Basic details about an item included in a playlist, including title, description, thumbnails, playlist the item is part of and position of the item inside the playlist.

playlistId.description: The playlist the item is part of.

position.description: The position of the item within the playlist.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the playlist item was published at.

resourceId.description: The ID of the resource referenced by the playlist item.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

PlaylistListResponse.description: A paginated list of playlists returned as the response to a youtube.playlists.list call.

items.description: List of playlists matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

pageInfo.description: Paging information for the list result.

PlaylistSnippet.description: Basic details about a playlist, including title, description and thumbnails.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the playlist was published at.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

PlaylistStatus.description: The status details of a playlist describes whether the playlist is private.

ResourceId.description: A resource id is a generic reference that points to another YouTube resource.

channelId.description: ID of the referred channel. Present only when type is "CHANNEL".

kind.description: The kind of the referred resource.

playlistId.description: ID of the referred playlist. Present only when type is "PLAYLIST".

videoId.description: ID of the referred video. Present only when type is "VIDEO".

SearchListResponse.description: A paginated list of search results returned as the response to a youtube.search.list call.

items.description: List of results matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

pageInfo.description: Paging information for the search result.

SearchResult.description: A search result contains information about a YouTube video, channel, or playlist that matches the search parameters specified in an API request.

etag.description: The eTag of the search result.

id.description: The id of the resource.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

snippet.description: Basic details about the search result: title, description, author.

SearchResultSnippet.description: Basic details about a search result, including title, description and thumbnails of the item referenced by the search result.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the found resource was published at.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

Subscription.description: A subscription resource contains information about a YouTube user subscription.

id.description: The unique id of the subscription.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

SubscriptionContentDetails.description: Details about the content to witch a subscription refers.

newItemCount.description: Number of new items in the subscription since its content was last read.

totalItemCount.description: Approximate total number of items the subscription points to.

SubscriptionListResponse.description: A paginated list of subscriptions returned as the response to a youtube.subscriptions.list call.

items.description: List of subscriptions matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

pageInfo.description: Paging information for the list result.

SubscriptionSnippet.description: Basic details about a subscription, including title, description and thumbnails of the subscribed item.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the subscription was published at.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

Thumbnail.description: A thumbnail is an image representing a YouTube resource.

Video.description: A video resource represents a single YouTube video.

contentDetails.description: Information about the video content, media file.

id.description: The unique id of the video.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

player.description: Information used to play the video.

snippet.description: Basic details about the video: title, description, thumbnails.

statistics.description: Statistics about the video: number of views, ratings.

status.description: Status of the video upload, privacy status.

VideoCategory.description: A videoCategory resource identifies a category that has been or could be associated with uploaded videos.

id.description: The unique id of the video category.

kind.description: The type of this API resource.

snippet.description: Basic details about the video category.

VideoCategoryListResponse.description: A paginated list of video categories returned as the response to a youtube.videoCategory.list call.

items.description: List of video categories matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

VideoCategorySnippet.description: Basic details about a video category, such as its localized title.

VideoContentDetails.description: Details about the media content of a YouTube video.

VideoListResponse.description: A paginated list of videos returned as the response to a youtube.videos.list call.

items.description: List of videos matching the request criteria.

kind.description: The type of this API response.

VideoPlayer.description: Player to be used for a video playback.

VideoSnippet.description: Basic details about a video, including title, description, uploader, thumbnails and category.

categoryId.description: Video category the video belongs to.

publishedAt.description: Date and time the video was published at.

tags.description: Textual tags associated with the video.

additionalProperties.description: A map of thumbnails by their name.

VideoStatistics.description: Statistics about the video, such as the number of times the video was viewed or liked.

commentCount.description: Number of comments for this video.

dislikeCount.description: Number of times the video was disliked.

favoriteCount.description: Number of times the video was added to a user's favorites list.

likeCount.description: Number of times the video was liked.

viewCount.description: Number of times the video was viewed.

VideoStatus.description: The status of a video details the video's upload status and privacy status.

failureReason.description: Present only if the uploadStatus indicates a failed upload.

rejectionReason.description: Present only if the uploadStatus indicates a rejected upload.

VideoTopicDetails.description: Freebase topic information related to the video.

topicIds.description: List of topic ids for this video *

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: One or more parts to return on the current request.

list.description: Browse the YouTube channel activity collection.

home.description: Flag indicating to return user's homepage feed.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return

mine.description: Flag indicating to return user's activities.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: Activity parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id, snippet and contentDetails.

publishedAfter.description: Only return activities published after given date (inclusive).

publishedBefore.description: Only return activities published before given date (exclusive).

list.description: Browse the YouTube channel collection. Either the 'id' or 'mine' parameter must be set.

categoryId.description: Filter to retrieve the channels within the given category ID.

id.description: YouTube IDs of the channels to be returned.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return

mine.description: Filter to only channels owned by authenticated user.

mySubscribers.description: Filter to channels that subscribed to the channel of the authenticated user.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: Channel parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id, snippet, contentDetails and topicDetails.

list.description: Browse the YouTube guide category collection.

id.description: Comma-separated YouTube IDs of the channelCategories to be returned.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: Guide category parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id and snippet.

regionCode.description: Return the channelCategories in the given region code.

id.description: YouTube IDs of the playlist items to be deleted.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

insert.description: Insert a resource into a playlist.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: One or more parts to return on the current request.

id.description: YouTube IDs of the playlist items to be returned.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: Playlist item parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id, snippet and contentDetails.

playlistId.description: Retrieves playlist items from the given playlist id.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: One or more parts to return on the current request.

id.description: YouTube IDs of the playlists to be deleted.

The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: One or more parts to return on the current request.

id.description: Comma-separated YouTube IDs of the playlists to be returned.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return

mine.description: Flag indicating only return the playlists of the authenticated user.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: Playlist parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id, snippet and status.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

part.description: One or more parts to return on the current request.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of search results to return per page.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: The authenticated user acts on behalf of this content owner.

enumDescriptions: Sort according to the view count.

part.description: Search result parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id and snippet.

published.description: Only search for resources uploaded at a specific pediod
enumDescriptions: No filter on the release date

relatedToVideo.description: Search for resources related to this video. Need to be used with type set to 'video'

topicId.description: Only search for resources with the specified topic

videoCaption.description: Add a filter on the the presence of captions on the videos.

videoDefinition.description: Add a filter for the definition of the videos.

videoDimension.description: Add a filter for the number of dimensions in the videos.

videoDuration.description: Add a filter on the duration of the videos.
enumDescriptions: Videos with a duration longer than 20 minutes.
Videos with a duration between 4 and 20 minutes.
Videos with a duration under 4 minutes.

videoLicense.description: Add a filter on the licensing of the videos.
enumDescriptions: Videos under the Creative Common license.

id.description: YouTube IDs of the subscription to be deleted.

part.description: One or more parts to return on the current request.

channelId.description: Only return subscriptions to given channelId.

forChannelId.description: Comma separated list of channel IDs to return subscriptions for.

id.description: YouTube IDs of the subscriptions to be returned.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of search results to return per page.

mine.description: Flag indicating only return the subscriptions of the authenticated user.

part.description: Subscription parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id, snippet and contentDetails.

hl.description: Language used for the title of the categories.

id.description: IDs of the categories to be returned.

part.description: Video category parts to include in the returned response. Valid values are: id and snippet.
